meanings.definition: The process of recording and transmitting data from a remote location.
meanings.sent1: The telemetry showed us the temperature of the faraway desert.
meanings.sent2: The scientists used telemetry to track the movement of the migrating birds.
meanings.sent3: The curious robot learned to use telemetry to send messages to its friends.
meanings.sent4: The telemetry acted as a magical bridge connecting the two distant lands.
meanings.sent5: With telemetry, we can see the unseen and know the unknown.

meanings.definition: The technology used to collect and transmit data from a distance.
meanings.sent1: We relied on telemetry to send signals to the spaceship.
meanings.sent2: The telemetry equipment helped monitor the health of the endangered species.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play with the telemetry device, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with wonder as she witnessed the power of telemetry in action.
meanings.sent5: Telemetry is like a messenger carrying secrets across vast lands.
